sect1.title: Controlling the Installation
sect1.para: Control the installation in one of several ways. Boot the setup with one of the options listed in . To enable the different control methods refer to .
A brief overview of the different methods:

listitem.para: This is the method most frequently used to install &productname;.
You can control the installation via SSH either in text mode or use X-forwarding for a graphical installation.
For this installation method you need a second computer connected by a null modem cable to the computer on which to install &productname;. The installation then proceeds in text mode.
Use this method if you want a graphical installation without direct access to the target machine.

If you need to install &productname; on several computers with similar hardware, it is recommended you perform the installations with the aid of &ay;. In this case, start by installing one &productname; and use this to create the necessary &ay; configuration files.
